justification: The article notes that "positively-valenced emotions with similar arousal at the same level were selected … using the Dictionary of Affect in Language (DAL)", indicating DAL was used to identify/measure the valence of emotion terms.

The authors state that Fanselow and Lester’s Threat Imminence Continuum (TIC) "provides a useful framework for examining how safety perceptions modify typical defensive behaviors," implying safety perception is operationalized via behavioral stages defined by the TIC.
